Description.Name: Description
Description.Text: The Courtyard by Marriott Moscow City Center is located in downtown Moscow, steps from Red Square, the Kremlin and Bolshoi Theatre, and convenient to corporate centers and embassies.

Description.Name: Property Description Long
Description.Text: Among the central Moscow hotels, Courtyard Moscow City Center hotel rises above. With a blend of charm, modern elegance and a historic landmark setting, this Moscow hotel's spacious accommodations, event space and impeccable service make it the perfect choice for business and leisure travellers. World-famous Red Square and the Kremlin are just a short walk from our Moscow hotel, invitingly located in a residential neighborhood. Cultural attractions such as the Bolshoi Theatre and the Pushkin State Museum of Fine Arts are nearby, as well as business centers and embassies. One of the most beautiful Moscow hotels, the Marriott Courtyard boasts a magnificent 462 sq m atrium filled with natural light, featuring the Lobby Caf√© attractively furnished and equipped for your convenience with free wireless high-speed Internet. Enjoy a delicious buffet breakfast in the Terraneo Restaurant. For the delightful dining experience visit the Flat Iron Bar and Roadhouse of our Moscow city center hotel.

Description.Name: Sales Message
Description.Text: Nestled between the buzz of City Hall (Tverskaya) and the finer tunes of the Tchaikovsky Conservatory (Nikitskaya), the hotel is located in a quiet residential street. Kremlin, Red Square and Bolshoi Theatre are a mere 10 walking minutes away.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 1
Description.Text: Our spacious Moscow accommodation - ideal choice for making the hotel room reservation in Moscow.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 2
Description.Text: Make your room reservation in our hotel. Moscow accommodation with natural lighting & stunning view.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 3
Description.Text: Our 218 Moscow Courtyard hotel rooms and suites offer modern amenities and 24 hour room service.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 1
Description.Text: Our moscow hotel is near the Tverskaya street with it's historical buildings, restaurants and clubs.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 2
Description.Text: Moscow Kremlin is situated in the very center of Moscow and 10 minutes walk from our hotel.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 3
Description.Text: Bolshoi Theatre that is near the hotel has always been & remains one of the major symbols of Moscow.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 4
Description.Text: Our Moscow hotel that is close to the Moscow P. I. Tchaikovsky Conservatory welcomes you!

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 5
Description.Text: Oldest & longest street in central Moscow, Tverskoy Boulevard is just 5 minutes walk from our hotel.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 6
Description.Text: Moscow Art Ttheatre on Stoleshnikov side street is located near the hotel. Just cross the Tverskaya.

Description.Text: Contact hotel for visa support information, if needed. Credit card authorization forms from third parties not accepted.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 6
Description.Text: Our four star hotel is located in city centre near Tverskaya street and Red Square.

Description.Text: Great Moscow wedding facilities with flexible banquet space in the historic center of Moscow.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 2
Description.Text: Dedicated event services manager, ready to assist you 24/7 with your Moscow wedding.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 3
Description.Text: 218 hotel rooms available for event, meeting or wedding guests in the downtown of Moscow, Russia.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: A contemporary urban restaurant and bar featuring the best of American cuisine served up with a modern twist. Our music format covers the best of rock, jazz, soul and easy listening. We feature live music on Thursday and Saturday nights.

Description.Name: Driving Instructions from Airport
Description.Text: From Sheremetievo International Airport proceed along Mezhdunarodnoe shosse, take the ramp onto Leningradskoe shosse, contnue onto Leningradskiy prospect. Road name changes to 1-ya Tverskaya-Yamskaya street. Go straight ahead onto Tverskaya street. Turn right onto Maliy Gnezdnikovskiy pereulok. Turn right to the Leontievsky pereulok then take the 1st left to the Eliseevsky pereulok and take then fisrt right to the Voznesensky pereulok. The Courtyard Moscow City Center is on the right side.You can also take the Aeroexpress from the airport to the Belorusskaya railwaystation and then change there to the Metro. Take two stops to the Tverskaya Metro station. The hotel is in 10 minutes walk from the Metro. Please call the hotel reception to arrange for airport transfer.

Transportation.Description: Drive Time to Airport in Rush Hour
Bus from Airport to Hotel Fee (one-way)
Subway from Airport to Hotel Fee (one-way)
Rail from Airport to Hotel Fee (one-way)

Description.Name: Driving Instructions from Airport
Description.Text: From Domodedovo International Airport proceed along Kashirskoe Shosse, Varshavskoe Shosse, Bolshaya Tulskaya Street. Turn left to the Serpukhovsky Val, turn right at the 2nd cross street to Mitnaya street. Then turn left to the Apakov proezd then turn left at the Leninsky Prospect continue onto the Bolshaya Yakimanka street and proceed along Bolshaya Polyanka street which becomes Mokhovaya Street. Take the 2nd left to the Bolshaya Nikitskaya street, turn right to the Brusov pereulok. Turn left to the Eliseevsky pereulok, turn left to the Voznesensky pereulok.The Courtyard Moscow City Center is on the right side.You can also take the Aeroexpress from the airport to the Paveletskaya railwaystation and then change there to the Metro. Take three stops to the Tverskaya Metro station. The hotel is in 10 minutes walk from the Metro. Please call the hotel reception to arrange for airport transfer.

Transportation.Description: Drive Time to Airport in Rush Hour
Bus from Airport to Hotel Fee (one-way)
Rail from Airport to Hotel Fee (one-way)

Description.Name: Driving Instructions from Airport
Description.Text: From Vnukovo International Airport proceed along Kievskoe Shosse, Leninsky prospect, Yakimanka street, Mokhovaya street. Turn left to the Bolshaya Nikitskaya streetand turn right to Brusov sidestreet. Then turn left to the Eliseevsky sidestreet then turn left to the Voznesensky pereulok.The Courtyard Moscow City Center is on the right side.You can also take the Aeroexpress from the airport to the Kievskaya railwaystation and then change there to the Metro. Take 2 stops to the Arbatskaya Metro station. The hotel is in 15 minutes walk from the Metro. Please call the hotel reception to arrange for airport transfer.

Transportation.Description: Drive Time to Airport in Rush Hour
Bus from Airport to Hotel Fee (one-way)
Subway from Airport to Hotel Fee (one-way)
Rail from Airport to Hotel Fee (one-way)

Description.Name: Group Description
Description.Text: Hotel is ideal for incentive and leisure groups up to 100 rooms due to prime location, 10 min walk to Kremlin. Modern conference facilities will meet needs of corporate groups. Catering space 554 sq.m. ideal for medium size conferences and trainings 80 PAX and big events up to 300 PAX

Description.Name: Sales strategy
Description.Text: Business hotel located in downtown 10 min walk to Kremlin. The main segment is Special corporate. Medium size (50-60 rooms) business groups required for weekdays and 100-150 rooms incentive/tourist/corporate for weekends. Preference to groups with catering. Catering space 554 sq.m, ideal for medium size conferences and trainings 80 PAX and big events up to 300 PAX. Need days: Monday-Tuesday, Saturday-Sunday

Description.Name: Value proposition 1
Description.Text: Full service hotel located in the heart of the city, within walking distance to the main sightseeing points.

Description.Name: Value proposition 2
Description.Text: Special rates for group accommodation for low season (July, August, mid December - mid January).Double Marriott Reward Points

Description.Name: Value proposition 3
Description.Text: Conference package starting from 2500 Rub for low season (July, August, January). Double Marriott Reward Points
